scripts.build-material: browserify -r material -x mout -x elements/zen -x elements/base -x prime -x mout -x mout/array/every -x mout/array/indexOf -x mout/lang/toString -x mout/array/filter -x mout/array/forEach -x mout/array/map -x mout/array/every -x mout/lang/kindOf -x mout/number/toInt -x mout/time/now -x mout/string/pascalCase -x elements -x moofx -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] --debug | exorcist build/material.js.map > build/material.js
scripts.build-demo: browserify dist/demo/app.js -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x moofx --debug -o 'exorcist build/demo.js.map > build/demo.js' -v
scripts.watch-demo: watchify -x slick -x mout -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x moofx --debug dist/demo/main.js -o 'exorcist build/demo.js.map > build/demo.js' -v
scripts.watch-element: watchify -x lib/component -x mout -x prime -x prime-util/prime/options -x prime/emitter -x mout -x elements -x slick -x moofx --debug dist/element/main.js -o -b 'exorcist dist/element/main.js.map > dist/element/bundle.js' -v
scripts.watch: npm run watch-lib & npm run watch-css
